settings.custom_liquid:
At Patty's Cakes, we're all about flavor! Our cakes are topped and filled with a light, airy icing that strikes the perfect balance between taste and texture, without being too sugary or hard.

We love creating Custom Cakes for any occasion and taste buds. With 11 cake flavors and 22 fillings to choose from, we're sure to make your dessert unforgettable.

Custom Cakes are the perfect way to tailor your cake to your event. You can mix and match flavors, select colors, get creative with the design, and feed any crowd size. We also offer classic and vegan options.

Please keep in mind that we require advance ordering to give your Custom Cake the time and attention it deserves. So plan ahead and let us create a delicious cake for your next celebration, whether it's a birthday, baby shower, bridal shower, religious event, or anything in between!

Cake Pricing Explained

Starting Online Price

This pricing is available for cakes purchased on our online store only. This is the starting price, plus artwork. The pricing will be listed on each cake.

Starting Regular Price

Is the pricing used when placing your order via email or in-person. This is the starting price, plus artwork.

What if your design is not available online?

Then the cake will be priced at the "Regular Starting Price." Yes, even if you design is only slightly different.

What is included?

All cakes include a filling and a basic design for the price listed. Additional artwork or changes will increase the price.

Sales tax is not collected.

Need More?

Not seeing what you are looking for? Send us a message

Gluten-Free Cakes

Items marked with this symbol have a gluten-free option available. Please be sure and ask for the gluten-free option when ordering.

Please note: We have the best intentions in making gluten-free items. However, we are not a gluten-free environment, so cross-contamination with ingredients containing gluten is a possibility.


Popular Flavors

Items marked with this symbol are popular flavors.

Keep in mind that all flavors are delicious and enjoyed by many. Explore your flavor preferences.

Custom Cake Icing

We ice our cakes in a light, airy icing, instead of hard fondant or overly sugary buttercream. Our light icing provides the perfect balance for flavor and texture as a topper and filling to our cakes.

Custom Cake Design

Your greeting, your colors, and a basic design are included in the price of your cake. If you want to go for a real wow factor, we can always get more elaborate for an additional charge.

Check out our photo galleries if you need some inspiration on the design, or send us a message today. We're here to help you make something memorable.

View Cake Photos

Custom Cake Colors

Here is our selection colors available for cakes and cupcakes. Keep in mind, that this is food, so colors will look slightly different, and we cannot match colors. We highly recommend avoiding deeper colors because they will bleed (not run) into the surrounding icing.

Color Swatches

You may inquire about a cake with an edible image or submit an image for an already placed order.

How To Order Custom Gluten-Free Cakes

Come into our shop, send us a message, or order online and your order can be placed in minutes. It's easy as pie… or cake.

Order Online

Our Cake Counter Hours

Tuesday-Friday, 10:00 am to 5:00 pm,
Saturday, 10:00 am to 4:00 pm

The Earlier the Better

We recommend placing your order as soon as you can, being early is a good thing. Our busiest days are Fridays and Saturdays and they always sell out, therefore we recommend placing your order 1-3 weeks ahead of time. We have many options of cakes to fit your timeframe or design requirements. We work within a first-come, first-served method and will accept new orders until we have reached capacity.

Cancellation/Change Policy

Organizing hundreds of weekly orders and ensuring quality takes a lot of prep time. Seven (7) days prior to the order date, all custom cake orders are final, the pickup time cannot be moved up, and no changes can be made to the items. If you must make a change, if available, there will be a $30 change fee added to the order.

FAQS: Have Questions? View Common Cake Questions
